evidence: Single package structure with clear module separation (pyexcel_xlsx with submodules book.py, xlsxr.py, xlsxw.py)
Well-defined interfaces using abstract base classes (ISheet, IReader, IWriter from pyexcel_io.plugin_api)
Separation of concerns with dedicated modules for reading (xlsxr.py), writing (xlsxw.py), and book management (book.py)
Plugin-based design evident from IOPluginInfoChainV2 usage and integration with pyexcel_io
Consistent internal API with clear data flow patterns
Comprehensive test suite organized by functionality
risks: Potential for increased complexity as more spreadsheet formats are supported
Single package structure may become unwieldy with significant growth
